post.description:
By clicking on the area of interest of your preference in the 2D plan, the model will emphasize where your mouse pointer is standing with no delay. This tool uses GLTF, a file format to store and share 3D models. Browser support of 3D technologies is a powerful alternative to show 3D models quickly, with virtually no loss of quality.

The world has become a global village. You can now share your ideas with your customers easier and faster. As professionals in the Software industry, we always keep ourselves updated with new technologies. That's why we chose some Open Source tools and combined them to create a 2D + 3D viewer, to demonstrate how easy it is to jump into the 3d world nowadays.

  • Visualize your model through the web.
